appDesc.message: More than the default image viewer

appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

fit_when_larger.message: Fit only when the image size is smaller than the window size

insert_css_bug_in_24_to_25_msg.message:
There is a temporary bug in Chrome 24-25. CSS cannot be inserted in image viewing page.
You can click Image Viewer's icon to activate Image Viewer manually. Or you can update Chrome to 26 version, but please notice that it is not a stable version now (2013-01-21).
